faqs.question: Are there any specific legal considerations for purchasing property in Sector 7
faqs.answer: When purchasing property in Sector 7, it is paramount to verify all ownership documents, ensure clear title deeds, and check for any outstanding mortgages or encumbrances. faqs.question: What types of residential properties are most common in Sector 7
faqs.answer: Sector 7 primarily features two main types of residential properties independent houses (kothis) and builder floor apartments. Builder floors are increasingly popular, offering modern amenities, dedicated parking, and separate ownership rights for individual floors (ground, first, second).
